body: The problem illustrated with this test is that the `tox_callback_conference_namelist_change()` is not invoked for A when A changes his name. I assumed that this is also incorrect behaviour if the user is not connected to the network, but correct me if this is not the case. I hope I haven't missed anything important. Greetings, pranomostro --- This change isâ€‚[](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/468)

comment_regular_data.body: Add the test to the auto-tests in CMakeLists.txt and in the Makefile fragment in the auto_tests directory.
@SkyzohKey how is this one ready when it introduces a failing test? We need to fix the code that's tested before merging a test that checks the fix.
@cebe there is a way to make this xfail, right? How would you do that? To make this test build and run, but expect it to fail.
@pranomostro: Please enable the checkbox "Allow edits from maintainers." on the bottom right.

> @pranomostro: Please enable the checkbox "Allow edits from maintainers." on the bottom right.

Done.

[![CLA assistant check](https://cla-assistant.io/pull/badge/signed)](https://cla-assistant.io/TokTok/c-toxcore?pullRequest=468)
All committers have signed the CLA.

--- Review status: 0 of 3 files reviewed at latest revision, all discussions resolved. --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/468#-:-KlnFJqA8-LH0FU19_kS:b-jbsf8z)*

commit.message:
Test for memberlist not changing after changing own name.

This test shows that the conference members callback is not invoked when
the own name changes.
